sec.p: The research was funded by the Sea World and Busch Garden Conservation Fund, Fondecyt N° 11110060, 1150517 INACH N° G06–11, T12–13 and 12–14, UNAB DI-410-13/I, and CNPq 482501/2013–8 and 490403/2008–5, FAPESP 2009/08624. Sampling of Adélie penguins at Cape Crozier was supported through funding from the National Science Foundation to David G. Ainley (ANT 0944411) and logistics supplied by the U.S. Antarctic Program. MM was funded by a New Zealand’s Ministry of Science and Innovation grant (C01X1001). PP was funded by the Saint Louis Zoo and the Des Lee Collaborative Vision.
